column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nsɛm yi ekyir no
column3: na Jezreelnyi Nabot wɔ wenyin ture bi wɔ Jezreel
column4: wɔ Samariahen Ahab n'ahemfi ho papaapa."

column2: "Na Ahab kaa kyerɛɛ Nabot dɛ
column3: Fa wo wenyin ture no ma me
column4: ma memfa menyɛ fan ture
column5: osiandɛ ɔbɛn me fi ho; na mebɛma wo wenyin ture a oye sen no mahyɛ ananmu: anaa
column7: medze mbrɛ odzi no mebɛma wo wɔ sika mu."

column2: "Na Nabot see Ahab dɛ
column3: EWURADZE mma ɔmpar me dɛ
column4: medze m'egyanom hɔn egyapadze mebɛma wo."

column2: "Na Ahab baa ne fie dɛ ɔayɛ kusuu na no bo efuw osian asɛm a Jezreelnyi Nabot ɔaka akyerɛ no no ntsi: na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Meremmfa m'egyanom egyapadze memma wo. Na ɔdaa ne mpa do
column4: na ɔdaan n'enyim kɔr ban ho

column2: "Na ne yer Jezebel baa ne nkyɛn
column3: na obisaa no dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo sunsum abɔm dɛm

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ mekasaa kyerɛɛ Jezreelnyi Nabot
column4: na mesee no dɛ
column5: Fa wo wenyin ture no ma me gye sika; anaaso
column7: mebɛma wo wenyin ture fofor mahyɛ ananmu: na obuaa dɛ
column8: Meremmfa mo wenyin ture memma wo."

column2: "Na ne yer Jezebel see no dɛ
column3: Ana nnyɛ ɔwo na ehwɛ Israel ahendzi do a? Soɛr dzidzi
column4: na ma w'akoma ntɔ wo yamu: medze Jezreelnyi Nabot no wenyin ture no mebɛma wo."

column2: "Nna ɔdze Ahab ne dzin kyerɛkyerɛɛw nwoma
column3: na ɔdze no nsɔwano dze sosɔɔw ano
column4: na ɔsomasomae ma wɔdze nwoma no kɛmaa mpanyimfo no na ekunyin a wɔwɔ no kurow mu a wɔnye Nabot tse no."

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ nwoma no mu dɛ
column3: Hom mbɔ dawur ma wondzi mbuada
column4: na wɔmfa Nabot ndzi tsir wɔ nkorɔfo no mu:"

column2: "na wɔmfa nyimpa beenu a wɔyɛ asansafo
column3: ngyina n'enyim
column4: na wɔmma wondzi dase ntsia no
column6: Ɔwo adom Nyankopɔn na ɔhen. Na nkyii hom mfa no mpue nkesiw no abo ma onwu."

column2: "Na no kurow no mu mbarimba no
column3: mekyerɛ mpanyimfo na ekunyin no a wɔtse no kurow no mu no
column4: yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Jezebel somae ma wɔdze kɛmaa hɔn no
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ nwoma a ɔsomae ma wɔdze kɛmaa hɔn no mu no."

column2: "Wɔbɔɔ dawur dɛ wondzi mbuada
column3: na wɔdze Nabot dzii tsir wɔ nkorɔfo no mu."

column2: "Na nyimpa beenu no
column3: asansafo no
column4: bae bɛtsenaa n'enyim: na asansafo no dzii dase tsiaa no
column8: Nabot adom Nyankopɔn na ɔhen. Nna wɔfaa no fii kurow no mu puei
column9: na wokesiiw no abo ma owui."

column2: "Nna wɔsomae ma wɔkɔr Jezebel nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column4: Woesiw Nabot abo

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Jezebel tsee dɛ woesiw Nabot abo ma oewu no
column4: nna Jezebel see Ahab dɛ
column6: kɛfa Jezreelnyi Nabot no wenyin ture no a ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔdze bɛma wo agye sika no yɛ enyadze; na Nabot nntse ase bio

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Ahab tsee dɛ Nabot ewu no
column4: nna Ahab soɛree dɛ orisian akɔ Jezreelnyi Nabot no wenyin ture no mu ɔakɛfa ayɛ enyadze."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'asɛm baa Tisbinyi Elija nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column6: sian kɔ nye Israelhen Ahab a ɔtse Samaria no nkedzi ehyia: hwɛ
column7: ɔwɔ Nabot no wenyin ture no mu
column8: hɔ na oesian kɔ dɛ ɔrekɛfa ayɛ enyadze."

column2: "Na ka kyerɛ no
column3: dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column6: na eso afa ayɛ enyadze? Na ka kyerɛ no dɛ
column8: Beebi mbrɛ nkraman tafeer Nabot no bɔgyaa no hɔ na nkraman bɛtafer ɔwo so wo bɔgyaa."

column2: "Na Ahab see Elija dɛ
column3: Me tamfo
column4: ana ehu me? Na obuaa dɛ
column5: Mehu wo: osiandɛ atɔn woho dɛ ereyɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: medze mbusu mebɛba wo do
column4: na mapra wo kwakwaakwa
column5: na metwa Ahab mu abofra banyin biara akyen
column6: na Israel mu nyia wɔatow no mu na nyia woegyaa no:"

column2: "na mebɛyɛ wo fi dɛ Nebat ne ba Jeroboam ne fi
column3: na Ahija ne ba Baasa ne fi
column4: wɔ ebufuw a edze eyi me na ama Israel ayɛ bɔn ntsi."

column2: "Na wɔ Jezebel ho so EWURADZE kaa dɛ
column3: Nkraman bedzi Jezebel wɔ Jezreel afasu ho."

column2: "Nyia ofi Ahab mu a obowu wɔ kurow mu no
column3: nkraman bedzi; na nyia obowu wɔ haban mu no wimu ntumbowa bedzi."

column2: "(Naaso obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ Ahab a ne yer Jezebel hyɛɛ no nkuran ma ɔtɔɔn noho dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do."
"Na ɔyɛɛ ekyiwadze dodow dɛ odzii abosom ekyir
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Amorifo a EWURADZE tuu hɔn wɔ Israelmba enyim yɛe no nyinara.)"

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Ahab tsee nsɛm no
column4: ɔtsetseew ne ntar mu
column5: na ɔdze eyitam kataa noho na odzii mbuada

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'asɛm baa Tisbinyi Elija nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column5: "Ana ehu mbrɛ Ahab esi na ɔabrɛ noho adze wɔ m'enyim a? Osiandɛ ɔabrɛ noho adze wɔ m'enyim ntsi
column6: meremmfa mbusu no memmba wɔ ne nda mu: na ne ba ne nda mu na medze mbusu no mebɛba ne fi do."
